message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, and this is a fair price considering its potential.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your budget constraints, the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer. I could consider letting it go for $18,000.
I'm still very interested in the product, but I really need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to go up to $13,500, but that's as high as I can go. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
